title: This Bookman made my hair fall out...
content:
Actually, I ripped it out by the roots!

The “s” and the “g” looks dead on to the Bookman family...but the “Q” is totally different. I can’t figure it out. Does anyone recognize this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/design_5127.gif)

 [‹ A sans, scanned and re-vectorized?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050257/http:/typophile.com/node/50045 "Go to previous forum topic") [BOHLERT MASSEY INTERIORS logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050257/http:/typophile.com/node/50043 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content: Save your hair! It’s not Bookman it’s [Century Oldstyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002050257/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/atf/century-oldstyle/familytree.html)!
